description: Existing boundary treatment to be replaced with stained timber featherboard fencing incorporating the installation of paneled timber fencing and gates to divide public rear garden; exterior varnish finish applied to external oak surfaces including plain fascia, half-glazed doors, Tuscan columns, porches, and windows with centered arches; timberwork repairs to existing conservatory; removal of defective brick wall an installation of timber sections to outbuilding; installation of two replacement windows to the ground floor male WC; hard and soft landscaping; installation of replacement public house sign above entrance to public bar; refurbish / replacement of existing external light fittings; installation of hanging planters; installation of external ceramic wall-mounted heaters; with associated internal alterations (Part Retrospective Application).
